paragraphs.text: “There’s one ball,” he responded. “Guess what we’ll do? We’ll put it in the hoop.”

5e0eca90a997.title: Klay has had a surprisingly mediocre season, but people only seem to notice his occasional scoring…

paragraphs.text: Klay has had a surprisingly mediocre season, but people only seem to notice his occasional scoring outburst. His PER is close to average at 17.57, and for all the talk of his defense, he rates as a minus defender per DRPM, even while on a top defensive team. Throw in his below average assist and rebounding rates at the SG position, and it’s hard to…

e78f46dddff8.title: I was there the night of Klay’s 37, and bliss is a good word for it.

paragraphs.text: I was there the night of Klay’s 37, and bliss is a good word for it. I’ve been lucky enough to see some great games live, but that is #1 for me. My favorite unheralded part, which speaks to the Warriors’ chemistry: Curry appeared to be having even more fun watching Klay do it.

566448760cd0.title: Klay’s potential was evident from the moment he arrived in Oakland, but Mark Jackson’s walk it up…

paragraphs.text: Klay’s potential was evident from the moment he arrived in Oakland, but Mark Jackson’s walk it up and dump it into the low post style stymied Klay’s development. Jackson had one of the best 3 point shooters of all time posting up on the block and shooting turnaround 10 footers. The offense that Kerr and Alvin Gentry installed unleashed Klay (and…
